item.title: Page 16 - Unexpected Events lead to your Future
item.description:
Page 16 - Unexpected Events lead to your Future

Here is an assignment for you to demonstrate in a personal way how unexpected events are strongly connected to your possible futures. Pick something important in your life - it can be anything. Now trace backwards in time to events that lead to the fact of this important thing in your life.

item.title: Page 21 - Is your future set? or random? or is it controllable?
item.description:
Page 21 - Is your future set? or random? or is it controllable?

In a Newtonian universe, you have one future and it is predetermined even if you can't calculate it in practice. In theory, you could. Although given the complexity of the universe, you could argue that the universe is random. This could also be what you conclude from trying to predict the future of a quantum...

item.title: Page 19 - Wall of Selfies from the Future
item.description:
Page 19 - Wall of Selfies from the Future

You don't have just one future - you have many possible futures. Imagine one year from now you take a selfie. There are many different selfies that you can imagine - some with old friends, some with new friends, some in different places, etc. Now imagine yourself in the middle of your living room -...

item.title: Page 15 - Events have fixed amount of connectedness
item.description:
Page 15 - Events have fixed amount of connectedness

Events have a fixed amount of connectedness that is distributed among past, present, and future possible events. All events that you experience have connections with other events that you may or may not have experienced in the past and with events that you may or may not experience in the future.

item.title: Page 20 - Wall of Flowing Selfies (in Uncharted Waters)
item.description:
Page 20 - Wall of Flowing Selfies (in Uncharted Waters)

Yesterday when I was describing the wall of selfies from the future, I didn't start off planning to describe them as moving. I have given the selfie analogy ten or so times before when talking to someone and have always considered the photos as static. I mention this so you know I am in a...

item.title: Page 17 - Drummer Girl
item.description:
Page 17 - Drummer Girl

The girl sitting at the table next to me just played drums for one of the songs. The bartender had just introduced her as a drummer, and the band allowed her to play. She knew the bartender because she had been at the bar last night with her family.

item.title: Page 32 - Examples of Quantum Sensing
item.description:
Page 32 - Examples of Quantum Sensing

You already sense parallel universes without realizing it. One of the most common ways is when you meet someone for the first time and feel like you know them somehow. This is often associated with a feeling that the two of you must have known each other in "another life".

item.title: Page 33 -Imagining 3+3=6 dimensions
item.description:
Page 33 -Imagining 3+3=6 dimensions

We are very well suited to imagine three dimensions because our world as we sense it is a three-dimensional space. You may remember learning about Cartesian coordinates in three dimensions, where any point in 3D space is represented by a coordinate (x, y, z). Now let's imagine that instead of each point representing a point...

item.title: Page 35 - Quantum Sensing the Future - This is HARD!
item.description:
Page 35 - Quantum Sensing the Future - This is HARD!

If you notice the dates, five days have passed here while I have been attempting to quantum sense your thoughts. I'm not sure why I'm having trouble, other than it's easier said than done. I think I know what I need to do different. One thing I realize is this will take a while -...

item.title: Page 34 - Who are you? Quantum Sensing into the Future
item.description:
Page 34 - Who are you? Quantum Sensing into the Future

I asked my uncle Kirk to read the prior 33 pages, which you have now read if you're reading in order. I'm wondering now about you ... who are you? Can I, in the present moment of writing this page, sense your thoughts in your present moment of reading this page?
